.. _general_1:

general
=======

.. currentmodule:: ansys.fluent.core.solver.settings_231.general_1

.. autoclass:: general
    :show-inheritance:
    :undoc-members:
.. rubric:: Children

==============================================   =======================================================

Child                                                                                            Summary

==============================================   =======================================================
:ref:`basic_info <basic_info>`                              Menu to define the rotor basic informations:

:ref:`disk_origin <disk_origin>`                             Menu to define the disk center coordinates.

:ref:`disk_orientation <disk_orientation>`                    Menu to define the rotor disk orientation.

:ref:`disk_id <disk_id>`                                      Menu to define the disk face/surface name:

:ref:`blade_pitch_angles <blade_pitch_angles>`       Menu to define the rotor pitch and flapping angles.

:ref:`blade_flap_angles <blade_flap_angles>`                      Menu to define the rotor pitch angles.

:ref:`tip_loss <tip_loss>`                                      Menu to define the rotor tip loss model.
